entry.tran: 热情洋溢的;奔放的；过分流露感情的
entry.def: If you describe someone as effusive, you mean that they express pleasure, gratitude, or approval in a very enthusiastic way.

example.ex: He was effusive in his praise for the general...

example.ex: She was very gushing and very effusive.
